title: kANikkai ElAi
sahitya:
kANikkai ElAi paramA em karuttinil inikkum karpakak-kaniyE


caraNam 1    Anip-pon muttum vairamum unran azhaginukk-azhagenalAmO
agahmigha negizha muguga mugugavenavE Arvak-kaNNIr aruvi adanaik-
    caraNam 2    eNNUm eNNam iyambum shorkkaL iyangum uNarvugaLellAm 
paNNum paNiyum payanum unakkE paNIndIndO paramA
    caraNam 3    ulagirp-paTTOm pala pala tunbam uDainda nenjuDanE 
khala khalavenrun karuNai urugak-kadarik-kAl piDittOm ammA
    caraNam 4    pOdum pOdum poikOL accam porAmaip-puNGaLellAm pOdum ulagam 
pOdum kalakam pUraNa sutantaranE emmaik-kANikkai ETraruLvAi
